mapper.sql: m.Id, m.Name, m.ParentId, m.Url, m.Icon, m.OrderBy, m.Controller, m.Action, m.OpenNewWindow, m.CreateBy, m.CreateTime
mapper.insert: insert into Menu ( Name, ParentId, Url, Icon, OrderBy, Controller, Action, OpenNewWindow, CreateBy ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openNewWindow,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
